Release iNFO

This release includes two files - a medium quality,1 CD size file, 
with VBR MP3 audio, and a second, high quality file, with one FLAC
stereo stream encoded from the PCM stream off the DVD, and the 
original AC3, 6 channel stream.



To play these files without problems I recommend:

http://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

!!!ATTENTION!!! For the FLAC stream to work, you have to enable FLAC
decoding in the "Audio decoder configuration" of ffdshow.
